name: Get Guns, Go Grapple
description:
The Current Build is the MVP and is still under development.

----------------------------------------------------------

Bottom of the food chain no more! Defend your planet from otherworldly sci-fi beings that are scattering titanic machinations all-around your planet. Use guns, a grappling hook, explosives, and more guns to your advantage in this fast-paced roguelike grappling hook shooter.

----------------------------------------------------------

The current build is a survival-type game, with roguelike elements coming soon. 

----------------------------------------------------------

Producer: Winterprise
Lead Designer: Xvyce
